item.title: List of films featuring extraterrestrials
item.description:
List of Films Featuring Extraterrestrials ðŸ”—

This Wikipedia page serves as a comprehensive index of films that prominently feature extraterrestrial beings. It provides a tabular listing of movies, their release years, and any associated franchises.

Film Listing ðŸ”—

The core of the page is a sortable table presenting an extensive list of films featuring extraterrestrials. Each entry includes:

  • Title: The name of the film, linked to its respective Wikipedia page for more information.
  • Year: The year the film was released.
  • Franchise: If the film is part of a larger franchise, it’s indicated here, linking to the franchise’s Wikipedia page. Many films are standalone entries, while others belong to well-known series like Alien, Cloverfield, Star Wars, Star Trek, Marvel Cinematic Universe, and Godzilla.

The list spans a wide range of cinematic history, from early silent films to recent releases, and encompasses various genres, including science fiction, horror, comedy, and animation.

See Also ðŸ”—

This section provides links to other relevant Wikipedia articles, including:

  • Lists of fictional extraterrestrials
  • UFOs in fiction

These links allow readers to explore related topics and delve deeper into the portrayal of aliens and UFOs in various forms of media.

References ðŸ”—

This section contains a comprehensive list of citations used to verify the information presented in the film listing. These references include links to reputable sources such as:

  • AllMovie
  • Rotten Tomatoes
  • The Hollywood Reporter
  • Empire Magazine
  • IGN
  • The New York Times
  • Variety
  • Space.com
  • British Film Institute
  • Turner Classic Movies
  • And many more.

These references ensure the accuracy and reliability of the information provided on the page.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_films_featuring_extraterrestrials
